resources.string: Might make the app unstable on older versions of Android
The minimum value cannot be equal to or greater than the maximum value
All deleted notes will be lost
Notes inside the bin cannot be edited
Your deleted notes will appear here for %1$d days
Notes are set to be deleted instantly
Cannot set a reminder for a past date
Search results will be displayed here
Invalid number of rows and columns
The app needs permission to access the camera to function. Please provide the required permission via Settings in order to use this app.

The app needs permission to access the microphone to record a video that contains audio. Please provide the required permission via Settings in order to proceed with this configuration. If you do not require your video to contain audio, you could just disable it (and enable it back later in the settings).
The app needs location permission for geo-tagging. Please provide the required permission via Settings in order to use this app.
Save output image as visible on preview (fixes inversion)
Occasionally get visual suggestions for straight/well-angled images
Adjust the quality of an image captured by the app from 1% to 100%. This field can be left empty to avoid explicitly setting the image quality.
Note: Geo-tagging/Location option is independent of this setting
Location is turned off. GPS navigation will not work.
GPS navigation does not work because there are no location permissions.
No GPS provider available. Please check your location settings and enable a location provider.
Logs locations to a GPX v1.1 file
Logs locations to a GeoJSON file
Go to the phone settings to enable or disable the providers.
Use locations provided by the satellite based location receiver on your device.
Use locations provided by the network based location receiver on your device.
Use locations obtained from other sources (useful for external GPS receivers).
That folder is not writable by GPSLogger. Please select another folder to write to.
Use 0 for maximum frequency, but slower is better for battery life.
The minimum distance required between current and previous for a point to be saved, otherwise the point will be discarded.
The minimum precision required for a point to be saved. Points that aren\'t this accurate will be discarded.
After acquiring an initial fix, keep trying for this long to get an accurate point to match the accuracy filter setting.

Number of seconds after which the app gives up on trying to acquire a fix, regardless of other settings. This is especially useful for when you are inside buildings to prevent the GPS from draining battery. Set to 0 for no timeout.
Uses Mean Sea Level (MSL) instead of WGS84 height by subtracting geoidheight from GPS altitude. Only applies to GPS satellite points, not network or NMEA.
A value in meters to subtract from GPS altitudes. Use a negative number to add a value to the altitude. Only applies to GPS satellite points, not network or NMEA.
This app requires various permissions in order to function properly. You will now be prompted multiple times for various permissions (sorry). Here is an explanation of each permission.
Device location - This permission allows reading location data from cell towers and the device GPS hardware.
Photos, media, files - This permission allows writing log files and test files to storage, and reading from a list of files for uploading or sharing. This app will not access your photos or media.
Allow all the time - Allow this app to receive location updates when running in the background.
Ignore battery optimization - Allow this app to run in the background by reducing battery optimization.

You have denied one or more permissions that GPS navigation requires. You will need to relaunch, or go to the system settings screen to grant these permissions.

If you have permanently denied permissions you can reset them in the system settings.
For GPS navigation to work in the background, you must provide additional permission. On the next screen please select: \"%1$s\"
Display duration and distance. Option to stop movement recording.
Delete all non-starred recordings? This action cannot be undone.
Hint: The accuracy of elevation data depends on your device. The uphill and downhill elevation of the whole route is measured.
Unable to save. Please install a file manager first.
Discard location fixes with an accuracy larger than (meters):
Number of waypoints used to smooth the elevation curve.
Delete all recordings in \"Tracks\" that are not starred.
Currently using GPS and Network for localization.
Currently using only GPS for localization.
Waypoints have higher accuracy but are less frequent.
Waypoints have lower accuracy but are more frequent.
Report bugs and suggest improvements on GitHub.

Clear cache, cookies, history, passwords, etc…
When javascript is disabled, many websites might not work properly.

When this option is enabled, URLs which references IPFS or IPNS content, will be automatically redirected to the local IPFS node. Currently only URLs of the form https://xxx/ipfs/… or https://xxx/ipns/… will be redirected.
If this option is enabled, the local node tries to find an HTML index file for a given ipfs or ipns URL if it is not specified.
The QR-Code contains the URL of the current website

You seem to have the app installed on an SD card, that makes the app widgets unavailable. You won\'t even see them on the list of available widgets. It is a system limitation, so if you want to use the widgets, you have to move the app back on the internal storage.
